unknown.error: An unknown error occurred, please try again later.
license.code.not.exist: License code does not exist. Please contact the administrator to obtain it.
sql.optimization.completed: Optimization for your SQL is complete. Follow the link to check the details.
NO_WORKSPACE: No valid workspaces. Please ensure you are logged in to the PawSQL website with the account associated with the configured API key to create a workspace.
NO_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE: No default workspace is set. Please configure it at the top of the sql file, or set the global default workspace in the PawSQL Workspace Manager
WORKSPACE_SELECTOR_PLACEHOLDER: Please select a PawSQL workspace to do optimization
CONFIG_FILE_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE_PLACEHOLDE: Setup a default workspace for PawSQL
error.backendUrl.invalid: The configured PawSQL engine is not responding.
error.frontendUrl.invalid: The configured PawSQL website is not responding.
license.code.not.valid: The license code is invalid. Please contact the administrator.
